title: ISMNormalCutFeatureData2.OffsetPlaneReference
description: Gets or sets the offset plane reference for the Normal Cut.
returns: Reference plane or top or bottom face of the sheet metal body
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISMNormalCutFeatureData2::NormalCutParameters
is set to
swNormalCutParameters_e
.swNormalCutOffsetPlane.
